means: 神圣化的，认可的，批准的
使神圣( sanctify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: This was a practice sanctified by tradition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一种合乎传统的做法。

sentence.Network_en: The priest sanctified the church with a special ceremony.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧师用专门的仪式使教堂显得神圣.

sentence.Network_en: In their eyes, the very ground on which he trod was sanctified.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他们的心目中, 他脚踏的地面都是圣洁的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神圣和神奇用英语怎么说_百度知道 ... 对...神圣 holy to 神圣化的 hallowed;   sanctified 神圣疾病 sacred disease.
更叫我们惊奇的，是神“挑出来的人”，正是拣选的同一个字，是“分别为圣”（sanctified）的意思。“矜夸高傲”并不是什么称赞的话，就 …

PerfectNetExp.exp: 若翰洗者既然在母胎中已圣化
PerfectNetExp.abs: ...圣的(sanctified)，圣灵乃是使人成圣的。…无论是被称为天使、天使长或 …8圣化特别提出：【若翰洗者既然在母胎中已圣化(sanctified)】。这是我们天主教提过的。更多释义收起释义类别:来源:难度:1. the seventh 2. th.

list.abs: St. Francis wanted to sanctify poverty , not to abolish it ., 圣弗朗西斯想圣化贫困而不是消除它.
...程,到了第七天,他歇工了, 并赐福那天,定那天为“圣日”(sanctified it)。
every pure , every refined and sanctified soul will be endowed with tremendous power and shall rejoice with exceeding gladness .每个纯粹、精炼和圣洁的灵魂都会被赋予超强的力量，会享受到极度的喜悦。

...躲避犯罪(DS 225-227)；显然奥氏提到的是指「圣化」恩宠。中世纪时，多玛斯在亚里斯多德(Aristotle,384-322)的概念影响下，认为人性本身藉着信望爱，在其理智及意志的潜能内接受圣化恩宠(sanctifying grace)，而以「受造恩宠」(created grace)(参353)来说明「圣化」在人内导致一种真正的改变。东方教会的神学中，常以「神化」(deification，divinization.
...他不赞成有超性，即常恩(habitual grace)及圣化恩宠(sanctifying grace)与本性两层思想。士林哲学所提出的两层思想.

entry.tran: (牧师、神职人员)认可，批准，使神圣化
entry.def: If something is sanctified by a priest or other holy person, the priest or holy person officially approves of it, or declares it to be holy.

example.ex: She is trying to make amends for her marriage not being sanctified.
example.tran: 她正努力弥补自己那段未受牧师认可的婚姻。

entry.tran: 批准;认可;使受尊敬;使固定不变
entry.def: If an organization or event sanctifies something, it makes it approved of and respected, or unable to be changed.

example.ex: ...a law that sanctifies changes that have already occurred.
example.tran: 认可已发生变化的一项法律

means.word_mean: 1. made or declared or believed to be holy; devoted to a deity or some religious ceremony or use;

auth_sentence.content: THE SESSIONSEasily the most highly sanctified movie about sex ever made.
